name: dataprep_ml.dashcam_images
description: contains info on each dashcam image s3 url

metadata.comment: The Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org
The date on which the DashcamAsset (i.e., the image) was captured in UTC time
The UNIX epoch time (ms) that the DashcamAsset (i.e., the image) was uploaded to cloud storage
The unique ID of the DashcamAsset object
The ID of the Samsara device from which the image was fetched. Is equal to the 'cm_id' or 'vg_id' depending which device the image was pulled from
The ID of the camera device that captured the image
The ID of the Vehicle Gateway device attached to the camera that captured the image
The location where the image is stored
The location where the corresponding metadata file of the DashcamAsset is stored
The UNIX epoch time (ms) of the DashcamAsset (i.e., image) creation in UTC time
The UNIX epoch time (ms) of the coinciding accelerometer event. The value is blank if no accelerometer event occured

The numerical code indicating the dashcam report type (e.g., {1: 'IMAGE_REPORT', 2: 'HYPERLAPSE_REPORT'})/n/n([Full list here](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/3cbb6df3db0e97ba9ecf9324ee3cf3f9602c3717/go/src/samsaradev.io/hubproto/camera.pb.go#L284))

The numerical code indicating the type of harsh accelerometer event (e.g., {3: 'haSharpTurn', 5: 'haCrash', 23: 'haSeatbeltPolicy'})/n/n([Full list here](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/dataplatform/tables/s3data/definitions/harsh_accel_type_enums.csv))
The direction that the camera's lens is facing (e.g., 'forward', 'inward', 'backward')
Angular distance north / south of the equator, in degrees
Angular distance east / west of Greenwich, England, in degrees
The speed of the device in meters per second, derived by COALESCE(ecu_speed_meters_per_second, gps_speed_meters_per_second)
The country in which the image was captured, formatted as an ISO Alpha-2 code
The state/province in which the image was captured
The name of the city in which the image was captured
